tool.name: RECoVC
tool.description: Try to obtain a clade from the consensus using nextclade
tool.command: cp $__tool_directory__/reference.fasta . && cp $__tool_directory__/genemap.gff . && cp $__tool_directory__/tree.json . && cp $__tool_directory__/qc.json . && cp $__tool_directory__/primers.csv . && nextclade --input-fasta=$consensus --input-root-seq=reference.fasta --genes=E,M,N,ORF1a,ORF1b,ORF3a,ORF6,ORF7a,ORF7b,ORF8,ORF9b,S --input-gene-map=genemap.gff --input-tree=tree.json --input-qc-config=qc.json --input-pcr-primers=primers.csv --output-tsv=$clade --output-dir=nextclade/ --output-basename=nextclade
